name: HAIR RESTORATION SERVICES
description:
Are your tresses limp, tangling, shedding, matted, dull, and disgusting? Don't let your investment go to waste. Send your hair to us and we will restore your hair Works on curly, wavy and straight & curly virgin hair. 



PRICE LIST

$100 FOR 3 BUNDLES 

$175 FOR 4 BUNDLES 

$190 FOR WIGS

$200 FOR 5 BUNDLES

$210 FOR 6 BUNDLES

CONTACT US FOR SPECIAL PRICING FOR

ANYTHING OVER 6 BUNDLES

name: Peruvian Wave Bundle Deal
description:
Peruvian Hair Explained

Besides being light as a feather, Peruvian hair is extremely soft to the touch. Even with as many as five bundles of this extension installed, you’re not going to lose that light and soft feel. It’s considered to be a bit coarser in texture than Indian or Brazilian hair. The luster of the extensions can be somewhere between low and medium.

 

One of the most appealing features with Peruvian hair is the way it blends quite nicely with African-American relaxed hair textures and medium Caucasian hair textures.

 

What is one word fans of Peruvian hair extensions would use to describe them? Luxurious!

 

And it’s worth repeating again that Peruvian hair is extremely easy to care for. All you have to do is follow a few simple steps, and your Peruvian hair extensions will look great and feel wonderful for a good deal longer than they would otherwise. 

Grade: AAAAA+ Virgin Hair
Texture: Wavy
Color: Natural
Item Type: Hair Extension
Place of Origin: Peru
Hair Extension Style: Straight
Price: The price is one bundle
Weight: 3.6 Oz per bundle (about 100 grams)
Material: Human Hair
Human hair type: 100% virgin temple hair

Short Description:
(1) 100% Virgin Temple Hair
(2)Flat Iron, Wash and Dry, Curl Avaliable
(3) Last more than 1 year
Quantity: 1 Piece
